2.0.name: wordpress/joomood-wp-se-last-albums
2.0.description:
This plugin/widget will display your Last X Social Engine Public Albums on your Wordpress blog.

Note: This Plugin requires the Official Social Engine Photo Album Plugin: http://www.socialengine.net/order.php

PHP Requirements: PHP 5.x (not tested with PHP 4)

Please, read the Installation Instructions in the Installation section of this page.

You may customize a lot of features, such as:

  • the total number of albums
  • the total number of albums per-line
  • the date format
  • a lot of style preferences like: colours, borders, pic dimensions a.s.o.

The widget and the plugin have separate configurations.
